languages.text: Wielder deals additional 20% damage with Melee weapons if there are more enemies than allies alive.

traits.locale_text: Wielder deals additional 20% damage with Melee weapons if there are more enemies than allies alive.

languages.text: At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, if there are more enemies than allies in combat, the wearer deals +20% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.
languages.original_text: Если в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа в бою больше врагов, чем союзников, персонаж наносит на 20% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} оружием {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g}.

traits.locale_text: If there are more enemies than allies in combat at the start of the wearer's turn, the wearer deals +20% more damage with melee weapons.

At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, if there are more enemies than allies in combat, the wearer deals +20% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.

At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, if there are more enemies than allies in combat, the wearer deals +20% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.

languages.text: Takan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başında çatışma alanında dost birimden çok düşman varsa takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} silahlarıyla +%20 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, if there are more enemies than allies in combat, the wearer deals +20% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.

traits.locale_text: Takan kişinin turunun başında çatışma alanında dost birimden çok düşman varsa takan kişi, yakın dövüş silahlarıyla +%20 daha fazla hasar verir.

Takan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başında çatışma alanında dost birimden çok düşman varsa takan kişi, yakın dövüş silahlarıyla +%20 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.

languages.text: Al comienzo del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador, si hay más enemigos que aliados en el combate, el portador inflige un +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional con armas {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, if there are more enemies than allies in combat, the wearer deals +20% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.

traits.locale_text: Al comienzo del turno del portador, si hay más enemigos que aliados en el combate, el portador inflige un +20 % de daño adicional con armas cuerpo a cuerpo.

Al comienzo del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador, si hay más enemigos que aliados en el combate, el portador inflige un +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional con armas {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.

languages.text: 装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，如果战场上的敌人数量多于盟友数量，则装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高20%。
languages.original_text: At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, if there are more enemies than allies in combat, the wearer deals +20% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.

traits.locale_text: 装备者的回合开始时，如果战场上的敌人数量多于盟友数量，则装备者使用近战武器造成的伤害提高20%。

languages.text: Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Trägers verursacht der Träger +20 % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} mit {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffen{/g}, wenn sich mehr Gegner als Verbündete im Kampf befinden.
languages.original_text: At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, if there are more enemies than allies in combat, the wearer deals +20% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn des Zugs des Trägers verursacht der Träger +20 % mehr Schaden mit Nahkampfwaffen, wenn sich mehr Gegner als Verbündete im Kampf befinden.

Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Trägers verursacht der Träger +20 % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} mit {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffen{/g}, wenn sich mehr Gegner als Verbündete im Kampf befinden.

languages.text: Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du porteur, s'il y a plus d'ennemis que d'alliés en combat, le porteur inflige +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} avec les armes de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, if there are more enemies than allies in combat, the wearer deals +20% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.

traits.locale_text: Au début du tour du porteur, s'il y a plus d'ennemis que d'alliés en combat, le porteur inflige +20 % de dégâts avec les armes de mêlée.

languages.text: 使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、戦闘中の味方よりも敵が多い場合、使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器で与える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+20%される。
languages.original_text: At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, if there are more enemies than allies in combat, the wearer deals +20% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.

traits.locale_text: 使用者のターン開始時、戦闘中の味方よりも敵が多い場合、使用者が近接武器で与えるダメージが+20%される。
使用者のターン開始時、戦闘中の味方よりも敵が多い場合、使用者が近接武器で与えるダメージが+20%される。

languages.text: Если в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа в бою больше врагов, чем союзников, персонаж наносит на 20% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} оружием {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, if there are more enemies than allies in combat, the wearer deals +20% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.

traits.locale_text: Если в начале хода персонажа в бою больше врагов, чем союзников, персонаж наносит на 20% больше урона оружием ближнего боя.
Если в начале хода персонажа в бою больше врагов, чем союзников, персонаж наносит на 20% больше урона оружием ближнего боя.
